title: Conflict Resolution Rule
description: Rule describing how to handle feast conflicts and potential transfers.

id.description: A short unique identifier to be referenced.

onConflict.description: Action taken when a conflict occurs.

condition.description: Conditional clause when this rule applies.

transferTo.description: Target description or key when transferring.

riteVersionId.description: Reference ID to the rite version.

movableFeastId.description: Reference ID to the movable feast (optional).

fixedFeastId.description: Reference ID to the fixed feast (optional).
